name: Config for the Bren mod
_comment_spawnCasingParticles: Spawns empty casings when a gun is fired
_comment_recoilMultiplier: The recoil multiplier, so 0 is no recoil

_comment_shotgunDamage: Damage per shrapnel for the Shotgun

_comment_netheriteRevolverDamage: Ranged damage for the Netherite Revolver
